net.sf.jailer.entitygraph.intradatabase

Class IntraDatabaseEntityGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jailer.entitygraph.EntityGraph
      • net.sf.jailer.entitygraph.remote.RemoteEntityGraph
        • net.sf.jailer.entitygraph.intradatabase.IntraDatabaseEntityGraph

  • public class IntraDatabaseEntityGraph
extends RemoteEntityGraph
    Specialized RemoteEntityGraph for exporting data into a different schema within the same database.
    Author:
    Ralf Wisser
